conbody.p: Toggle the REGENMODE system variable to specify if the display automatically regenerates when needed. You can launch this command at the Command prompt or within another command by preceding it with an apostrophe: 'REGENMODE.

ul.li: On: turns on the REGENMODE system variable.
Off: turns off the REGENMODE system variable.
Toggle: changes the REGENMODE system variable to the opposite of the current setting.
